hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that:a woman came to the Prophet and became Muslim, and a man married her. Then her first husband came and said: "O Messenger of Allah, I became Muslim with her, and she knew that I was Muslim." So the Messenger of Allah took her away from her second husband and returned her to her first husband

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الزَّوْجَيْنِ يُسْلِمُ أَحَدُهُمَا قَبْلَ الآخَرِ
chapter.eng-name: When one spouse becomes Muslim before the other
